title: Mutyala Haaram with Kundan Pendant - Emerald Symphony
materials: Fresh Water Pearls. Features a premium Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisite haaram features a circular kundan pendant with intricate Polki diamond floral motifs. A central, high-clarity emerald adds a touch of regal elegance. The pearl and emerald tassel adds a modern twist to the traditional design, exhibiting exceptional craftsmanship.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to make a sophisticated statement. Also suitable for Seemantham (Baby Shower) or Half-Saree functions
offering a blend of tradition and contemporary appeal.
description: This haaram seamlessly blends traditional craftsmanship with modern design sensibilities. The Polki diamonds lend a timeless charm, while the emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring lasting beauty. A truly unique and versatile piece.
